subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hallo Steve,

> I think when you are in tune to get communication
> with the other side, it doesn't matter whether it's a box or Evp 
> Maker.  If they want to talk with you, you will get communication 
> with whatever you use.

This is exactly what I think, too.

Stefan
